column2: Put the words in the correct order.
column3:
You need a camera. Your friend has one.
You say:
Could {{c1::I}} {{c1::borrow}} {{c1::your}} {{c1::camera}} (your / borrow / camera / I)?

column2: Put the words in the correct order.
column3:
Somebody has phoned you, but you are very busy.
You say:
Can {{c1::I}} {{c1::call}} {{c1::you}} {{c1::back}} {{c1::later}} (back / you / call / later / I)?

column2: Put the words in the correct order.
column3:

column2: Put the words in the correct order.
column3:
You and a friend are on a train. It's hot.
You say:
Is {{c1::it}} {{c1::OK}} {{c1::if}} {{c1::I}} {{c1::open}} {{c1::the}} {{c1::window}} (OK / window / I / the / if / open / it)?

column2: Put the words in the correct order.
column3:
You're in a clothes shop. You want to see if some trousers fit OK.
You ask the assistant:
Can {{c1::I}} {{c1::try}} {{c1::on}} {{c1::these}} {{c1::trousers}} (on / trousers / I / these / try)?

column2: Put the words in the correct order.
column3:
You go into a cafe and see some people you know.
You say:
Do {{c1::you}} {{c1::mind}} {{c1::if}} {{c1::I}} {{c1::join}} {{c1::you}} (I / mind / you / join / if / you)?

column2: Put the words in the correct order.
column3:
A: Do you {{c1::know}} {{c1::who}} {{c1::those people}} {{c1::are}} (are / those people / know / who)?
B: {No, I've never seen them before.}

column2: Put the words in the correct order.
column3:

column2: Put the words in the correct order.
column3:

column2: Put the words in the correct order.
column3:

B: {Don't worry. I'll manage OK.}

column2: Put the words in the correct order.
column3:

B: {Straight on and it's on the left.}

column2: Put the words in the correct order.
column3:

B: {No, everybody was OK.}

column2: Put the words in the correct order.

column2: Put the words in the correct order.
column3:
A: I don't know yet {{c1::what time}} {{c1::I}} {{c1::will}} {{c1::arrive}} (what time / will / I / arrive) tomorrow.

column2: Put the words in the correct order.
column3:
A: {Why is Vicky unhappy?}
B: I don't know. She won't {{c1::say}} {{c1::what}} {{c1::the problem}} {{c1::is}} (the problem / is / say / what).
